name: The Revenge of the Gods
description:
Greek Gods have come back to take revenge on humanity for replacing them with other Gods! 

Play as Thanatos, God of Death.  Your mission will be to defend the Gods temples from the human warriors by killing them with your divine scythe.

But Death is only the beginning! After killing warriors you'll have to descend to the underworld and drag and drop each soul to its corresponding temple, so they can rest in peace.

Be fast and strategic to get to the Leaderboard and be the Ultimate God of Death!
